com.team1389.hardware.outputs.hardware

Class PIDVoltageHardware

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team1389.hardware.outputs.hardware.PIDVoltageHardware

  • public class PIDVoltageHardware
extends java.lang.Object
    Can PID control a voltage controlled motor given a sensor. Can do either speed control or position control. Most importantly, this class will ensure that a given motor is only being used by one controller at once, and that it has been given all required configuration before it runs.
    Author:
    Jacob Prinz
